solution_line_template: Mario's ${monday_price} cut on Monday would have been {weekend_increase_percent_num}% more expensive on Sunday or ${monday_price}*{weekend_increase_percent_num}% = $<<{monday_price}*{weekend_increase_percent_num}*{percent_factor}={weekend_increase_amount}>>{weekend_increase_amount} more expensive

That means he would have paid ${weekend_increase_amount} more on Sunday than what he paid (${monday_price}) on Monday or ${weekend_increase_amount}+${monday_price} = $<<{weekend_increase_amount}+{monday_price}={sunday_price}>>{sunday_price}
